016package io.micronaut.maven.testresources;
017
018import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
019
020/**
021 * Base configuration class for Test Resources.
022 *
023 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
024 * @since 3.5.1
025 */
026public class TestResourcesConfiguration {
027
028    public static final String DISABLED = "false";
029    public static final String CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX = "micronaut.test.resources.";
030
031    private static final String PROPERTY_ENABLED = "enabled";
032
033    /**
034     * Whether to enable or disable Micronaut test resources support.
035     */
036    @Parameter(property =  CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + PROPERTY_ENABLED, defaultValue = DISABLED)
037    protected boolean testResourcesEnabled;
038
039    /**
040     * Whether the test resources service should be shared between independent builds
041     * (e.g different projects, even built with different build tools).
042     */
043    @Parameter(property = CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "shared", defaultValue = DISABLED)
044    protected boolean shared;
045
046    /**
047     * Allows configuring a namespace for the shared test resources server. This can be used in case it makes sense to
048     * have different instances of shared services, for example when independent builds sets share different services.
049     *
050     * @since 3.5.1
051     */
052    @Parameter(property = CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "namespace")
053    protected String sharedServerNamespace;
054
055    /**
056     * Allows starting the test resources server in debug mode. The server will be started with the ability
057     * to attach a remote debugger on port 8000.
058     *
059     * @since 4.2.0
060     */
061    @Parameter(property = CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "debug-server", defaultValue = DISABLED)
062    protected boolean debugServer;
063
064    /**
065     * @return Whether to enable or disable Micronaut test resources support.
066     */
067    public boolean isTestResourcesEnabled() {
068        return testResourcesEnabled;
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * @return Whether the test resources service should be shared between independent builds.
073     */
074    public boolean isShared() {
075        return shared;
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * @return The shared server namespace (if any).
080     */
081    public String getSharedServerNamespace() {
082        return sharedServerNamespace;
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Whether to enable or disable Micronaut test resources support.
087     *
088     * @param testResourcesEnabled enabled flag
089     */
090    public void setTestResourcesEnabled(boolean testResourcesEnabled) {
091        this.testResourcesEnabled = testResourcesEnabled;
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Whether the test resources service should be shared between independent builds.
096     *
097     * @param shared shared flag
098     */
099    public void setShared(boolean shared) {
100        this.shared = shared;
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * The shared server namespace (if any).
105     *
106     * @param sharedServerNamespace the shared server namespace to be set
107     */
108    public void setSharedServerNamespace(String sharedServerNamespace) {
109        this.sharedServerNamespace = sharedServerNamespace;
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * Whether to start the test resources server in debug mode.
114     *
115     * @param debugServer debug flag
116     */
117    public void setDebugServer(boolean debugServer) {
118        this.debugServer = debugServer;
119    }
120}
